DataElement.preferredDefinition: The anatomic site within the body as captured by the SNOMED CT code.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Published by the College of American Pathologists, the Systematized Nomenclature of Medicine Clinical Terms is a combination of content of SNOMED Reference Terminology and READ codes.:The study of anatomy based on regions or divisions of the body and emphasizing the relations between various structures (muscles and nerves and arteries etc.) in that region.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PCDC Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description:
1. Go to the SNOMED standalone terminology available via NCI Term Browser at: 
https://ncit.nci.nih.gov/ncitbrowser/pages/vocabulary.jsf?dictionary=SNOMED%20Clinical%20Terms%20US%20Edition&version=2022_09_01
2. Enter your search term in the Search box.
